name: Megatect (itch)
description:
• "Megatect is not just a game, it's a toolkit for building your own games – a shiny sandbox that nurtures creativity and creation." - Alpha Beta Gamer

Think of Megatect as a level editor without limitation! Use a slew of blocks, objects, and wires to create your own challenge maps, Arenas, sports, whatever you can dream up! Play solo or with friends and share grids online for others to play!

Megatect is currently in Alpha! Check Here to see whats available now, and what plans I have for future developments!

OR

Check out the shareware demo! The demo does not include the launcher and features less blocks than the Alpha, But everything else is intact. Including multiplayer! Share this demo with your friends and build together!

http://timedropstudios.com/megatect/

Suggestions for additions always welcome!
